title: Sunder
description: Every town has its secrets.Secrets that hold it, and the people who live there, together.When Liv Daniels moves to Wolfville, Maine with her father,she discovers the small town has more than its fair share.But the quaint, coastal townsfolk aren't the only ones with secrets.Liv has one too.Hers is buried deep inside of her, where even she doesn't know it exists.But someone does, and he's not going to give up until he breaks it free from her.But how do you free someone from a secret they don't know they have?
author: Tara Brown
